title: 6 songs 'Good Omens' writer Neil Gaiman loves
text:
6 Music is celebrating the world of comics and graphic novels this October, with the genre's finest sharing the music that’s inspired them.

In Neil Gaiman's Paperback Writers (available to hear until Mon 4 November), the acclaimed author of 'Sandman', 'Good Omens', 'American Gods' and more shares some of the music that's helped shape his work.

One of the most skilled contemporary writers, Gaiman's talent has been applied to comic books, graphic novels, poetry, film and television.

Here are six of the songs he plays in his Paperback Writers show, coupled with personal anecdotes behind the tracks.
description: The legendary comic book writer and graphic novelist selects the music he loves
